article: british troops and the top british diplomat in basra on tuesday welcomed prime minister gordon brown 's announcement of slashing their contingent in iraq by half , starting next spring .
abstract: british troops official welcome pm brown s announcement of further troop reductions
candidates: the british contingent in iraq will be cut by half starting next spring.
